title: I Don't Recommend Making A Mistake With Your Male Friend
alternative_title: I Do Not Recommend Making Mistakes With Your Male Friend ; I Don't Recommend Making a Mistake With Your Male Friend ; I Don't Recommend Male Friends and Mistakes ; Mistakes Made With Your Male Friend Are Not Recommended ; Stick to the Friend Zone ; รักเกิดในคืนภาพตัด ; 남사친과 실수는 추천하지 않습니다
status: I Do Not Recommend Making Mistakes With Your Male Friend ; I Don't Recommend Making a Mistake With Your Male Friend ; I Don't Recommend Male Friends and Mistakes ; Mistakes Made With Your Male Friend Are Not Recommended ; Stick to the Friend Zone ; รักเกิดในคืนภาพตัด ; 남사친과 실수는 추천하지 않습니다
description:
Description :
        “You spent the night with the guy who was your childhood friend??!” 

From the obstetrics office to high school, I spent most of my life together with him, Ji Seo-jun. Thanks to his dazzling good looks, I, Moon Da-yul, his best friend, had to endure a difficult school time and swore I would never get involved with him again. But… after getting drunk, I woke up in a strange hotel room, and next to me was Ji Seo-jun! Can our 29-year friendship survive?
